job.title: Senior Front End Software Engineer (Websites & Payments)
job.description: Sr Backend Software Engineer Websites amp PaymentsbrbrPatientPop is a healthcare technology company that helps practices thrive with an all in one practice growth solution Our platform empowers practices to promote themselves online attract patients and retain them for life We improve every digital touchpoint along the patient journey so patients can easily find and choose a practice and become their advocate We also improve every aspect of a practices online presence to help them attract the right patients to their services and keep them coming backbrbrWeve helped thousands of providers since our founding in 2014 Along the way we cultivated an incredible work environment  one of the best according to Great Place to WorkbrbrNow we want you to be a part of it allbrbrstrongHow you will contributebrbrstrongThis position requires you to contribute to all aspects of development code review unit testing debugging and implementation You should be comfortable with taking on new engineering challenges A selfstarter with the ability to plan organize and establish priorities to meet goals and achieve resultsbrbrstrongSkills youll bringbrstrongulliBachelors or Masters degree in computer scienceliliYou should be comfortable with taking on new engineering challenges defining potential solutions and implementing designs in a team environmentliliExperience in Java Python or PHP and a passion to learn new languagesliliExperience with JS frameworks on the front end Vuejs a major plusliliExperience in microservices development working at scale and dataliliKnowledge of microfrontend is a plusbrliulstrongWhy youre important to usbrbrstrongTo win and keep our customers love we obsess over our platform Our products depend on our ability to remain reliable as we grow Were looking for someone who shares our passion for engineering and can work with us to produce solutions of the highest quality delivering clear and simple cleanly documented codebrbrstrongIn 90 days you willbrbrstrongContribute to the development and support of micro services and automations You should prepare to have an immediate impact on the organization from day one Youll take this far beyond your first 90 days Expect to constantly be learning challenging yourself and strategizing with your team on building a worldclass engineering practicebrbrPatientPop has one simple mission help healthcare practices thrive Our solution is the leading allinone practice growth platform thats HIPAAcompliant and helps providers promote their practice online attract patients and retain them for life Learn more at patientpopcombrbrstrongBenefitsbrstrongulliOpportunity to create impactliliOwnership and autonomyliliOpportunities to host PatientPop talksliliPaid maternity and paternity leaveliliRemote friendly or relocation assistance providedlili100 fullypaid health dental and vision optionsliliStock optionslili401 kliliOur HQ is 2 Blocks from the beach next to the promenade and dog friendlyliliAnd many more perksbrliulWe will consider for employment all qualified Applicants including those with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable state and local laws including the City of Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinancebrbr
